question: Who has clinched the 2017 men's singles title at the Thailand Grand Prix Gold badminton tournament?
explanation: Bhamidipati  Sai Praneeth from India has won the Men\'s Singles Crown in the Thailand Open Grand Prix Gold badminton tournament by defeating Indonesia\'s Jonatan Christie   in a tough three-game final on June 4, 2017 in Bangkok. This is the first Grand Prix Gold title for Sai Praneeth.
